summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's personal and business accounts at Deutsche Bank for the month of July 2015. It details various outgoing transfers to different entities, highlighting significant financial activities during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for July 2015
events.description: Summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance at Deutsche Bank, showing a beginning balance of $531,774.66.
Significant outgoing transfers include $28,000 to JPMorgan Chase and $16,000 to another entity.
The ending balance as of July 31, 2015, is $331,774.66 after various transactions.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries regarding the account.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
